GeneDef.label: pain reversal
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have scrambled senses that make them feel pain as pleasurable.

GeneDef.label: docile
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene are generally docile. They are easy to enslave and rarely rebel. They are also less likely to start prison breaks or have violent mental breaks, and never start social fights.

GeneDef.label: herd instinct
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene need the comfort of being in a large group. They get a mood penalty if there are too few members of the colony. They also don't mind sleeping in a barracks.

GeneDef.label: berserker
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have a chance of going berserk when they are damaged in combat, melee attacking the nearest enemy until all enemies are dead. They receive stat bonuses while berserk. This ability can't be controlled.

GeneDef.label: hyperlactation
GeneDef.description: Female carriers of this gene produce large amounts of breast milk, and lactate even when not pregnant or breastfeeding. This gene is inactive on males and on females younger than 13.
